node.title: Deep Breathing
node.field_crave_tip_description: Use deep breathing to fight cravings and stressful situations. Try 10 slow, deep breaths.

node.title: Distraction
node.field_crave_tip_description: Distract yourself. Clean out your car, desk, or junk drawer until the craving passes.

node.title: Busy Hands
node.field_crave_tip_description: Keep your hands busy when a craving hits. Play with a coin, straw, or rubber band.

node.title: Talk Through it
node.field_crave_tip_description: Talk through it. Call or text a friend when youâ€™re stressed out or sad.

node.title: Use Exercise
node.field_crave_tip_description: Use exercise to get in a better mood. Physical activity is a natural mood booster.

node.title: Nicotine Replacement Therapy
node.field_crave_tip_description: Try nicotine replacement therapy (NRT), such as gums or patches. Using NRT can double your chance of quitting for good.
